feat: add IndexerConfigProvider for centralized configuration

Added React Context-based configuration system to eliminate the need to pass
indexer base URL to every hook call. Consumers can now configure once at the
app root level.

Changes:
- Added IndexerConfigContext with provider and hooks
  - IndexerConfigProvider: Wrap app to set base URL once
  - useIndexerConfig: Access config in components
  - useIndexerConfigOptional: Optional config access

- Updated useIndexerPoints to support both approaches:
  - New: Use context config (no params needed)
  - Old: Pass URL directly (backward compatible)

- Exported new configuration from main entry point

- Added CONFIG_GUIDE.md with comprehensive examples:
  - Environment-based configuration
  - React and React Native usage
  - Testing patterns
  - Migration guide

- âœ… Easy environment switching

- âœ… Better DX and cleaner component code

Usage:
